messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

two assets with the same name en thursday december re thursday december hello please review two assets same name senior consultant

message.reasoning:

I'm now focusing on assigning the correct category to the IT ticket. The description mentions "assets with the same name," which I believe points most accurately towards "Hardware," assuming these are physical IT assets whose naming convention requires attention.
